channel.title: Artful on Mathematical Michael
channel.description: Recent content in Artful on Mathematical Michael

item.title: Calendar
item.description: A polygon is made with the number of sides corresponding to the year. The number of distinct distances between the vertices of this shape and the origin are determined by the day. The month influences the open-ness of the shape. In some instances, it appears to function like an aperature.

item.title: Moving Pictures
item.description: Please watch this space in the coming weeks. I am reviving an old project that I have presented at a few conferences as an undergraduate. This work kickstarted (well, more like it really developed) my deep love for coding. I am now transcribing work into Python to get away from the limitations of Matlab’s licensing structure. It is a lengthy process. Please be patient.
